Detailed Description

Class represente a configuration file. This class contais method checking the version number of a configuration file, testing if the file exists in the path or other usuable functionnality.

bool ConfigurationFile::exists ( const QString &  directoryPath  )  [static]

Test if the configuration file exists in the directory path. The configuration file has the name configuration.xml

Parameters:
DirectoryPath The path of the directory where we check if a configuration file exists.
Returns:
True if the configuration file exist, else return false.

const QString& ConfigurationFile::filename (  )  const

ConfigurationFile & ConfigurationFile::operator= ( const ConfigurationFile &  p  ) 

ConfigurationFile ConfigurationFile::simpleConfigurationFile ( const QString &  directoryPath  )  [static]

Return the version of the configuration file (only if the file exists and the version can be found). This method parse the configuration file to find the version number. If he find him, the parser stop immediatly to not read the entierly.

Parameters:
DirectoryPath the path where the configuration file is.
Returns:
A ConfigurationVersion with the version number or an invalid object if the version can't be found.

ConfigurationVersion ConfigurationFile::version (  ) 

Return the version of the configuration file.

QString ConfigurationFile::xmlPresentationFile (  ) 

Return the name of presentations files, if defined, else return presentation.xml
